content: travel socks by diane lyles in honor of the terrific and talented students in my basic sock anatomy class well done i am most comfortable when my feet are warm i sleep better knit better enjoy my coffee better and travel better with warm feet this little pair of socks helps me keep my feet warm and fashionable they are super stretchy and designed with a loose cuff so that they are comfortable enough to sleep in i keep a pair in my car my suitcase and my knitting bag they also make terrific last minute gifts i hope you enjoy them as much as i do materials -­ 1 50-gram ball of cascade fixation yarn or similar dk weight stretchy yarn -­ 1 set of us 5 3 75mm double pointed needles or size required to obtain gauge -­ 1 removable stitch marker or coiless safety pin -­ 3 stitch markers -­ row counter -­ tapestry needle size abbreviations women s medium us 9-11 sock measures rs right side 6 75 inches in diameter un-stretched but will stretch to fit a foot 9-inches in circumference sock ws wrong side length is adjustable note that extra yarn will be k knit required to accommodate a large or long foot p purl notes on knitting with yarn containing elastic sl slip_stitch as if to purl yarn should be held taunt and stretched slightly ssk slip 2 stitches as if to knit knit these two while knitting a gauge swatch is recommended stitches together though the back loop gauge yo yarn over 25 stitches = 4 inches in stockinette stitch in the k2tog knit 2 together round do not wash or stretch gauge swatch while p2tog purl 2 together measuring pm place marker gauge swatch to knit a gauge swatch in the round cast on 25 pattern stitches stitches and distribute over three double point k1 p1 rib needles and join for working in the round knit a minimum of 12 rounds and slide the knitting off of all rounds k1 p1 repeat around the needles and lay it flat on a smooth surface stockinette stitch measure the width of the swatch and double it it all rounds knit should be 4 inches if swatch is too small try using a larger needle if swatch is too large go down in needle size this pattern is available for personal use only no reproduction in part or in whole or
